# Communications Tower Design Build, Pacific Rim National Park Reserve

## Tender Details

**Reference Number:** cb-840-78183967
**Solicitation Number:** 5P468-23-0246/A
**Tender Closing Date:** January 4, 2024, 4:00 PM EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** January 15, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 25, 2024

## Tender Description

Parks Canada seeks a Design Build Contractor to provide radio communication services at the Pacific Rim National Park Reserve. The scope of work includes designing, supplying, and installing a communications tower and shelter at the Telegraph Hill location, which can provide improved radio services within the park.

**Value:** The estimated value of the project is between $100,001 and $250,000 (excluding taxes).

## How to Submit a Bid

Bids must be submitted electronically via email to [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca) or by fax to 1-855-983-1808. Bids sent via SAP Ariba or in-person will not be accepted.

**Important:** Please note that emails with attachments exceeding 15 megabytes will not be accepted. Bidders are advised to submit their bids in multiple emails if necessary.

## Submission Requirements

A two-submission bidding process is required. Refer to IB06 of the Special Instructions to Bidders for details.

## Enquiries

Technical and contractual enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority. Enquiries received after five business days prior to the tender closing date may not be responded to.

## Conditions of Contract

The successful bidder must comply with the National Parks Regulations and complete the work by the expected contract end date.

**Note:** The tender description, including specifications and drawings, can be downloaded from the Government of Canada's procurement platform at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).
